name: R Drive
description: RDrive - an initiative to provide cloud storage for every faculty and student of IITR. Made by the vision - Whatever is uploaded in RLand should stay in RLand (unless permitted)

name: Covid Vaccine Tracker
description: A Tracker to Check the availability of vaccine through pincode and buzzer in case of availability

name: Counselling Portal
description: Counselling Portal - an Portal to book online counselling sessions with qualified counsellors for students of IITR. Made by the vision - Growing is a continuous process and discussing your problems will enable you to make mature choices and take appropriate actions

name: Restaurent
description: Fully Responsive, with mysql powered server progressive web app for small restaurants, with integrated simple booking system and basic administration tools for the restaurent staff

name: Tic Tac Toe
description: This is a complete and an awesome Tic Tac Toe game, with a great design and all the necessary features. To create the AI for this game, Mini Max algorithm is used. It is fully loaded with animations and illustrations
